title: Savage Lands v0.3.0
description:
FIXED:
Lots of bug fixes (thanks to the community for finding and reporting these!)

    Bears no longer cause performance issues on some machines; Bear spawners reactivated
    Armor now uses correct icons and models
    Tweaked physical scale of meat items
    Issue with 5:4 resolution
    Removed temp items being spawned in Argo
    Bags now appear in order on the UI
    Deer have less of a chance to run out into the water
    Deer are now slightly more alert



ADDED:
General:

    Additional abandoned camps have been added
    New Relics have mysteriously appeared on the west and east coasts of the Sundered Isle


Art, Visual FX and UI:

    New FX for Kur added
    SFX for getting burned added



Crafting:

    All recipes updated to use coal as forge fuel where it makes sense.
    Bag recipes have been revamped
        Dire Bear Hide Backpack changed to rare item
        Flesh Wrapped Bag changed to rare item
        Flesh Wrapped Bag slots increased to 15
        BoarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Tusk Pouch slots increased to 10
        Torn Rucksack slots increased to 6



Creatures:

    Kur now shows signs of anger



Equipment:

    Long Bow and Arrows have been added to the crafting list
    Stones can now be thrown at enemies
    All weapon recipes rebalanced:
        Worn Weapons:
            Worn weapons no longer craftable; can be found in villages and camps
            Worn weapon durability increased
        Crude Spike Club
            Damage reduced and weapon set to common
            Can be used for both mining and chopping trees
        Oak Skull Smasher
            Renamed to Skull Smasher
            Now a common craftable item.
            Stats and recipe mats adjusted accordingly
        Barbed Skull Mace:
            Is now an Uncommon craftable item.
            Stats and recipe mats adjusted accordingly
        Stone Sword:
            No longer craftable
            Drops form Furies and found in Villages and towns
        Savage Steel Cleaver
            Damage increased;
            Recipe mats increased
        Flesh Bound Hammer
            Now a rare craftable item
            Stats and recipe mats adjusted accordingly
        Blackened Steel Sword recipe and stats adjusted
        Fashioned Long Sword has been renamed to Wolfsbane:
            Wolfsbane damage increased
        Forged Obsidian Blade and Serrated Steel Sword have been removed from the crafting list in preparation for inclusion as drops on named creatures in the world
